title: REF
body: Will we get refunds rest ?? bc pulsfier ez after rework its still lame as f... not worth 3.15 rp .. we prob wont but it would be nice from riot to do something for players cuz they never gave us gifts :p

replies.body: It looks like you just recently bought Pulsefire Ezreal, and have since been using the skin. If you still have any refund tokens left you should be able to get him refunded that way. Otherwise, check out the [**content refund faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864) to see if this would qualify, then hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
